description: Amendments to planning permission dated 06 July 2017 (RN: 17/03700/FULL) (as amended on 12 March 2019 (RN: 19/00018/FULL) and 30 April 2020 (RN: 20/01904/FULL) to allow minor material amendments) for 'Addition of a mansard roof extension and associated alterations to the mews property; excavation to create a new basement level with swimming pool below mews house and part rear of main house, erection of rear infill extensions at lower ground and ground floor level, erection of rear extensions at first and second floor level, and a roof access enclosure at main roof level, creation of terraces at first and main roof level, mechanical plant, and associated external alterations in connection with the use as a single family dwellinghouse (site includes 24 Eaton Mews North)'. Namely, alterations to front and rear elevations including installation of three CCTV cameras, a sounder bell box, door entry panels, and new timber panelled entrance doors.
